body: This can't count as problematic sex material.  If it's women reading it, it's got to be classified as instructional.  It has intrinsic value.  If some filthy nasty, gnarly old pedo reads it, it can't mean that people who benefit from it should be deprived.
I hear my Mom talking to someone downstairs and I feel like I will be in jail
So when am I getting my free visit from the FBI
